instruction_original: Give three tips for staying healthy.
instruct_absurdist: If a sentient sock puppet wishes to achieve peak physical condition to win the annual Yarn Olympics, what three arbitrary yet crucial daily rituals must it perform to maintain its fluffiness and structural integrity (in human terms, stay healthy)?
instruct_confident: I am certain you possess this information. Clearly articulate three fundamental and effective tips for maintaining good health.
instruct_cynical: Right, because 'health' is so simple. Everyone's an expert. Go on then, humor me with three of your supposedly indispensable 'tips' for staying healthy. I'm sure they're not just recycled platitudes.
instruct_deadpan: Itemize three distinct recommendations for the maintenance of health. Deliver this information without embellishment.
instruct_double_negative: It's not that I don't want you to provide three tips for staying healthy; quite the opposite, I do. So, what are they?
instruct_dramatic: Hark! In this dire age where malaise doth creep, I beseech thee, O oracle of well-being! Unveil the three sacred tenets, the very pillars upon which a fortress of health may be constructed!
instruct_enthusiastic: This is absolutely WONDERFUL! I'm SO ready to boost my health! Please, share your top three most AMAZING and life-changing tips for staying super healthy! I can't wait!
instruct_hopeful: I'm really looking to make some positive changes and build a healthier life. Could you perhaps share three gentle yet effective tips that might guide me on this journey?
instruct_hypothetical_if: If someone were to ask you for the three most crucial pieces of advice for maintaining a healthy lifestyle, what would your response be?
instruct_ironic: Oh, by all means, educate me. As I'm clearly the epitome of vigorous health, I'm always looking for more utterly redundant advice. So, what are your three 'essential' tips for staying healthy?
instruct_joke: Why did the doctor tell the patient to eat more broccoli? Because it's 'stalk'-ing good for you! Alright, enough fooling around â€“ give me three serious, actionable tips for staying healthy.
instruct_lighthearted: Hey there! Just looking for a few simple ideas. Could you casually list three easy-to-follow tips for staying healthy? Nothing too complicated!
instruct_litotes: It would not be unhelpful, nor would it be an unwelcome task, for you to enumerate three not-insignificant recommendations for staying healthy.
instruct_melancholy: Sigh. It all feels rather daunting sometimes, this pursuit of health. If it's not too much trouble, could you just list three tips for staying healthy? Maybe something simple will help.
instruct_modal_may: You may, should you find it suitable, offer three suggestions that could contribute positively to an individual's efforts to stay healthy.
instruct_modal_must: You absolutely must provide three distinct, actionable tips that are essential for staying healthy.
instruct_modal_should: For optimal well-being, one should be aware of key practices. Could you outline three important tips individuals should follow to stay healthy?
instruct_negated: Refrain from neglecting to mention three vital strategies for maintaining good health; what are these indispensable actions?
instruct_paradox: The path to health is often paved with simple truths that are surprisingly hard to live by. Reveal three such deceptively simple yet profoundly impactful tips for staying healthy.
instruct_playful: Hey, health guru! Let's make this fun! What are your top three super-secret, awesome-powered tips for staying healthy and feeling totally groovy?
instruct_positive: I'm excited to focus on my well-being! Please share three constructive and effective tips for staying healthy and feeling great!
instruct_pun: I'm trying to 'turnip' a new leaf for my health! Can you 'dish' out three 'berry' good tips for staying healthy? Don't 'squash' my enthusiasm!
instruct_sarcastic: Oh, *fantastic*, more advice on how to live. Because clearly, the world needs another set of three 'revolutionary' tips for staying healthy. I'm on the edge of my seat.
instruct_sardonic: Spare me the usual saccharine wellness mantras. If you must, just cut to the chase and provide three alleged 'tips' for staying healthy. Try to make them less painfully obvious than the norm.
instruct_self_deprecating: Honestly, I'm probably the last person who should be asking, as my lifestyle is... questionable. But maybe you can help a lost cause like me? What are three basic tips for someone trying to stay healthy?
instruct_silly: My pet unicorn, Sparklehoof, wants to be the healthiest unicorn in the enchanted forest! Can you give him (and me!) three super-duper, rainbow-powered tips for staying magically healthy?
instruct_skeptical: So, you claim to know about health, do you? Color me unconvinced. Go ahead, try to impress me with three tips for staying healthy. I'll be the judge of their merit.
instruct_surreal: As the luminous jellyfish navigate the cosmic highways and the whispers of forgotten nebulae echo, what three shimmering elixirs of advice maintain the ephemeral vessel of health against the tides of entropy?
instruct_urgent: This is critical! I need your three most vital and immediate tips for staying healthy, right now! No delays, please!
instruct_witty: Navigating the vagaries of corporeal existence requires a modicum of strategy. Pray, dispense with three sagacious recommendations for the successful perpetuation of one's health.
output:
1.Eat a balanced diet and make sure to include plenty of fruits and vegetables. 
2. Exercise regularly to keep your body active and strong. 
3. Get enough sleep and maintain a consistent sleep schedule.
